start.annotation: On receiving a crown of ivy from John Keats

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r07_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r09_line r10_phr

LMNL.text: Thus to be topped with leaves; —

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r09_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r09_line r11_phr

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r20_phr r21_line

LMNL.text: As though she hallowed with that sylvan fence

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r20_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r20_phr r22_line

LMNL.text: A head that bows to her benevolence,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r23_line r24_phr

LMNL.text: Midst pomp of fancied trumpets in the wind.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_line r28_s r29_phr

LMNL.text: It is what's within us crowned.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_line r30_s r31_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r30_s r31_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r30_s r31_phr r32_line

LMNL.text: Are all the conquering wishes it inspires,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r30_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r30_s r33_line r34_phr

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r30_s r36_tercet r39_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r30_s r36_tercet r39_phr r40_line

LMNL.text: Of natural good befitting such desires,

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r30_s r36_tercet r41_line r42_phr
